title: thecodebear
author: thecodebear
content: Just a couple cool shares from this past week.I was on vacation in Maui the past week and I saw this cool Bitcoin Bull in the window of a fine art metal shop.Also went on a snorkeling boat tour and after it was over the guys running it asked for tips and named several ways they take tips including Bitcoin! First time I've ever personally experienced someone saying they take Bitcoin for payment (it was just for the tip, but still cool).

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Initially, I was perplexed as to why there was a bear here when the bull was in Maui. However, after reading through the thread, I came to understand the situation better. It's encouraging to witness someone actively promoting and selling Bitcoin Bull publicly. This will likely entice current users to make a purchase while also piquing the curiosity of others. Consequently, this may lead to the attraction of new Bitcoin users, which is a positive development.

comments.author: thecodebear
comments.body: Yeah I didn't see any bitcoin payment signs there, just the apply pay. But really cool to see the Bitcoin bull there. I wanted to not have the apply pay sign in the picture but it was right in front of the bitcoin piece so there wasn't any way to not have it in the shot haha.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: That bull should work as a symbol to restore the faith of holders that think the bull market will come soon! Aside from that I believe that the art piece was crafted very well and it really makes the message clear for the audience. Such positive things can really be helpful for the investors who have been hodling their bitcoins since last time high of $60k above.I think we should appreciate such art pieces that are somewhat related to our crypto-community. The mare appreciation would give the boost in the performance of those artists who are also working for the benefit of the community. Such artists are doing their best to reach their way toward those museums and that requires so much efforts. I'm very amazed by the art piece and I really admire the artists!

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: It's just funny because you can see the Bitcoin logo not because of the bull statue. It just means that whoever owns that place is definitely related and a Bitcoin enthusiast.That's also a good factor for awareness in the communities there that there is somehow a Bitcoin community in that area, proving that Bitcoin is spreading in different parts of the world.

comments.author: Honnet43
comments.body: Looks like Bitcoin is making its way into the tourism industry too! I wonder if other tour companies will start accepting it as well?

comments.author: KiaKia
comments.body: In truth, it's getting better every year with bitcoin. The adoption rate is spiking up every year to get more adoptions than it did in the past, and this is a very bullish sign. As a result, some influences believe Bitcoin's next all-time high will be even better than what we've seen previously. Many people think influencers just say whatever they feel like.The truth is these predictions are based on the adoption rate of bitcoin, which increases every year, and the higher the adoption rate, the stronger the next bull market will be. I have a very good feeling about the future.
